remarks: Join of equivalence classes under the fineness relation-part one. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fnejoin1 $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ A. y e. S X = U. y /\ A e. S ) -> A Fne if ( S = (/) , { X } , U. S ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d S y $.
$d X y $.
